title: The.Happening.2008.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch
description:
The.Happening.2008.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS RIFFTRAX
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK2 FOR 5.1 OR TRACK3 FOR 2.0

The Happening 2008
video: 1920x1080 AVC
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax AAC 2.0
audio2: just movie AAC 2.0
audio3: just movie AAC 5.1
subs: English built in, off by default, not hard coded, software switchable
Rifftrax released 2008.10.21 1hour30min23sec 1,834,084,775

This is a 1920x1080 remux of Reign Of Fire with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Big thanks to the posters of the 1080p/5.1 encodes of the movies, the subs and the chapters. This uses the Judas source as it was better quality then YIFY, but neither where great quality originally. 

If these Rifftrax were enjoyable, you haven't paid for them and you have a few dollars to spare, please consider purchasing these riffs (3.99USD) or make a general donation (5USD and up) - they take Bitcoin now too
